title: Generally available: Premium-series hardware for Azure SQL Managed Instance
summary: Leverage new Azure SQL Managed Instance premium-series hardware based on the latest Intel CPUs that offers significantly improved performance and scalability.

title: Generally available: Virtual machine restore points
summary: For customers and Azure partners who are looking to build business continuity and disaster recovery solutions, VM restore points provide a feature rich building blocks available natively on Azure platform.

title: General availability: Azure Archive Storage now available in South Africa North
summary: Reduce spending by storing rarely accessed data to Azure Archive Storage, now in new regions.

title: Public preview: Ephemeral OS disk support for confidential virtual machines
summary: Create confidential VMs using Ephemeral OS disks for your stateless workloads.
